title: The Little Village’s Ultimate Doctor - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Polygamy
author: Melodious Flute   箫声悠扬
description: Longyang Village is well-known by its neighbors as a widow’s village since there is a scarcity of adult males. The village’s sole college student Long Xiaoshan was framed and sent to prison. He returned to the small mountain village in his prime as a small farmer with some mysterious medical skills and a heaven-defying spiritual treasure. Cool and elegant village chief, fresh and pure widow, alluring aunt, next-door neighbor’s smart-alecky girl, watch how this young farmer turns this widow’s village into an enormous piece of land!>
